overview.eaover: Key attribute field names and descriptionsMaterial- trail surface typeWidth- width of trail in feetTrl_Length- length of trail segment in feetName- primary name of trailName2- secondary name of trailPark Name- Name of the park where the trail occurs. Thematic mapping Use the NAME field for thematic mapping and labeling.
